title: Texas Authorities Lower Bail For Bikers Arrested In Waco Shooting
teaser: Bail for bikers arrested in last month's Waco, Texas, mass shooting has been dramatically lowered from the original $1 million to at least $25,000. Some families say the bikers were unfairly arrested.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
